remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用委派以處理事件類型或元件變更時。The following sample demonstrates how to use a delegate to handle the event when a type or component changes. 在程式碼的`OnRefreshed`事件處理事件，並顯示所要變更的元件。In the code, the `OnRefreshed` event handles the event and displays the component being changed. 程式碼會假設`TextBox`已設置控制項在表單上。The code assumes that a `TextBox` control is already sited on the form.
